Params: {1: '1', 3: 'You and Hanying open the mystery box together, and discover a piece of indigo-dyed silk.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It looks like a dancer's ribbon, with star-shaped embellishments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'On countless starlit nights aboard this ship, I danced with ribbons just like these... It brings back memories.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Commandant, may I dance for you with this ribbon?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying puts on the indigo ribbon with delight, and starts to dance to the evening breeze.'}
{3: 'She twirls, floats, and leaps... Her graceful body and dreamy gaze outshine even the starlit sea.'}
{3: 'At the end of the dance, she wears a faint smile, gives her fan a gentle wave, and offers a graceful bow.'}
{2: 'It suits you well.', 3: '15', 4: "It doesn't look good...", 5: '16'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You gifted me these ribbons. Dancing with them allows me to express my deepest feelings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Um... Did I look nervous? Well... wearing your gift stirs up something special in my heart...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lowers her gaze as a gentle blush spreads across her cheeks.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The night is still young... Will you sit and talk with me for a while?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Under the romantic moonlight, your silhouettes merge onto a canvas of stars...'}
